overview:
Peter Sharkey is co-founder and CFO at Bislr.

Prior to Bislr Peter was Project Manager at Sharkey Media, managing the development and implementation of prominent Australian startups and businesses such as Flying Solo (www.flyingsolo.com.au).

Peter holds a Bachelor of Business and Bachelor of Laws (Honours, First Class) and was formally an intellectual property solicitor for Freehills representing clients such as Macquarie Bank, Investec, Morgan Stanley, Diageo, Kimberly-Clark, and Telstra.
